Generation V.Black: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.
Generation V.White: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.
Generation V.Black 2: Stories say those who tried to catch Zoroark were trapped in an illusion and punished.
Generation V.White 2: Stories say those who tried to catch Zoroark were trapped in an illusion and punished.

Generation VI.X: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.
Generation VI.Y: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.

Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It doesn't just transform itself—it also has the power to make hundreds of people see its illusions.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: If it thinks humans are going to discover its den, Zoroark shows them visions that make them wander around in the woods.

Generation VIII.Sword: This Pokémon cares deeply about others of its kind, and it will conjure terrifying illusions to keep its den and pack safe.
Generation VIII.Shield: Seeking to ease the burden of solitude, lonely Trainers tell Zoroark to show illusions to them.
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: With its disheveled white fur, it looks like an embodiment of death. Heedless of its own safety, Zoroark attacks its nemeses with a bitter energy so intense, it lacerates Zoroark's own body.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Stories say those who tried to catch Zoroark were trapped in an illusion and punished.
Generation IX.Violet: Each has the ability to fool a large group of people simultaneously. They protect their lair with illusory scenery.

Generation V.White: Lostlorn Forest (requires Shiny fateful encounter Entei , Raikou , or Suicune ) Evolve Zorua (requires fateful encounter Celebi )
